info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:08PM EDT until July 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 607 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beach Haven, or near Berwick, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Conyngham, Nescopeck, White Haven, Jeddo, East Berwick, Woodside-Drifton and Drifton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
